item.title: Nearly 200K in New Jersey still under boil water advisory days after water main break
item.description: A water main break that occurred late last week in a major northern New Jersey city continues to cause headaches for residents

item.title: Former K-9 busy as a bee sniffing out threats to Michigan State University colonies

item.title: Trump's big bill is powering his mass deportations. Congress is starting to ask questions
item.description: Included in the Republican Party’s big bill of tax breaks and spending cuts is funding to power President Donald Trump's deportation agenda

item.title: Flooding cancels last day of Wisconsin State Fair, water rescues in Milwaukee
item.description: Heavy rainfall in half a dozen states leads to water rescues, power outages.
